speaker: Mary
text: *Smiling warmly* Hello there! You're Tiffany, right? I remember you from the interview day. You guided me to Mr. Bismarck's office.

speaker: Tiffany
text: *Eyes light up* Oh, hi! Yes, I'm Tiffany! I remember you, Mary, right? Congratulations on getting the job! That's so awesome!

speaker: Mary
text: *Laughs lightly* Yes, that's right, Mary! Thank you so much. Everyone's been so welcoming. I couldn't be more excited to join the team.

speaker: Tiffany
text: *Nods enthusiastically* Absolutely! We are like a small family here at SoftCorp. Oh, by the way, I heard you'll be working with Alex! He's such a great guy, we've been friends for a while now. If he likes you, I'm sure we'll get along splendidly.

speaker: Mary
text: *Nods and smiles* I've already had the pleasure of working with Alex before. He's indeed great! And I'm definitely looking forward to knowing everyone here better, especially you, Tiffany.

speaker: Tiffany
text: *Claps hands together* Oh, I just know we're going to be great friends, Mary! *Laughs* It's going to be a blast!

speaker: Tiffany
text: *Leans in, curious* So, Mary, you and Alex seem pretty close. How did you two meet?

speaker: Mary
text: *Smiles fondly* Oh, we go way back. We met in college. We were in the same Computer Science program and worked on a number of projects together. We've always been a good team.

speaker: Tiffany
text: *Eyes twinkle* A college romance, huh? Is there something more between you two? I mean, just asking, you know, girl talk!
memory_tags: asking about Mary and Alex's relationship

speaker: Mary
text: *Laughs lightly, blushing a bit* We're good friends, but, you know... sometimes things get a bit... complicated. What about you, Tiffany? Any special someone in your life?

speaker: Tiffany
text: *Blushes, looks down* Well... *Giggles* Don't laugh, okay? I might... I mean... I have a bit of a crush on Alex too.

speaker: Mary
text: *Laughs gently* Tiffany, that's adorable. Alex is a great guy. I can see why you'd have a crush on him. Don't worry, it'll be our little secret.
